name: Sing Chan Endoscopy
address: Flushing, NY (Specific address not provided in search results)
description: Dr. Sing Chan is a board-certified gastroenterologist specializing in gastroenterology and liver disease. He serves the New York Metropolitan area and tri-state area

name: GI Health
address: 139 Centre Street, Suite 611, New York, NY 10013 (Lower Manhattan/Chinatown)
description: GI Health is a premiere gastroenterology practice in Lower Manhattan and Brooklyn, offering advanced treatment options for gastrointestinal issues. They are founded by Dr. Anthony Ng, MD, and are associated with New York Presbyterian. They offer services in Mandarin

name: Manhattan Gastroenterology
address: Multiple locations in Manhattan, including Chinatown
description: This practice has highly-rated, board-certified gastroenterologists and hepatologists with multiple convenient locations. They are known for their patient-focused care and advanced diagnostic technology. Dr. Dana Zhao and Dr. Eric Yoon are listed as gastroenterologists at Manhattan Gastroenterology, with Dr. Zhao having a special interest in women's health and Dr. Yoon being double board-certified

name: Mount Sinai
address: Various locations across New York, including Mount Sinai Doctors - 168 Centre Street
description: Mount Sinai offers a wide range of services, including those for the Asian American community, with multi-lingual providers and experienced medical interpreters. They have gastroenterologists who speak Chinese (Mandarin and Cantonese)
